q1: I think both BVB and Barcelona is a good team.
a2: That is not a question, but I agree Barcelona is better.
q3: Do you think maybe they just have more money to spend?
a3: It doesn't matter how much money they have to spend, as long as they are a great team.
q4: Do you think they are one of the best teams right now?
q5: What is the net worth of Dortmund?
a5: Forbes lists the team worth at $901 million.
